remarks: Continuity of ring multiplication; analogue of ~ cnmpt12f which cannot be used directly because ` .r ` is not a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
statement:
mulrcn.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` R ) $.
cnmpt1mulr.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
cnmpt1mulr.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. TopRing ) $.
cnmpt1mulr.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
cnmpt1mulr.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> A ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
cnmpt1mulr.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> B ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
cnmpt1mulr $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( A .x. B ) ) e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
$d J x $.
$d K x $.
$d R x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
